titleStmt.title: The religion of an oath a discourse proving the danger and immorality of rash and prophane swearing / by the late reverend and judicious Dr. Claggett.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: "Reprinted on occasion of the Parliament's address to His Majesty to issue out his proclamation against immorality &c."
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
